pages.text: These are all of the recipe changes pertaining to Spectrum.

$(li)Added Mana Powder to CMY Pedestal upgrade.$(li)Added Hex Ash to Onyx Pedestal upgrade.$(li)Added Pixie Dust and Soulwood Planks to Moonstone Pedestal upgrade.$(li)Bedrock Armor requires Liquid Void instead of Midnight Solution.$(li)Bedrock equipment now requires netherite instead of gold.
